column1: #Text=Back in Republic City , everybody loves Varrick 's Nuktuk movers .
#Text=Everybody , that is , except Mako , whose pursuit of Varrick has landed him in the slammer .
#Text=And in the Southern Water Tribe , Unalaq 's army is nearing victory in the Civil War , but Tonraq is n't about to give up without a fight .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Her spirit is trapped in the Spirit World , but she 's going to be all right .
#Text=" Pema says : " How could this happen ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " It was all my fault .
#Text=I should have never let Jinora enter the Spirit World without me .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm so sorry , Pema .
#Text=I tried to save her , but Unalaq tricked me .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Do n't worry , honey , I 'm not going to stop until our little girl is back safe with us .
